Author: throneofweigh
Text: If you can see a psychologist that would be good, and it might be a good idea to stop fasting for the near future. Basically everyone here can vouch for how harmful fasting can be wrt developing eating disorders

Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: It sounds like things are pretty tough for you in regards to your feelings around food and eating. It's probably worth checking in with a doctor and maybe seeing a psychologist and dietitian to start to unpack this before things get too out of hand.  It's really not uncommon for eating disorders to be triggered by a diet and you don't need to be underweight to struggle with your relationship with food.
